lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator

Class Coin

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.Coin

  • public class Coin
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple representation of a coin.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Coin(int value)
      Creates a coin with the specified value in cents.
